articles.title: Boston activist Monica Cannon-Grant to plead guilty in federal fraud case
articles.description:
Cannon-Grant was expected to stand trial next month.

The post Boston activist Monica Cannon-Grant to plead guilty in federal fraud case appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Monica Cannon-Grant will plead guilty in a federal fraud case next month.
Cannon-Grant, a prominent Boston activist, faces charges related to misuse of funds.
Her guilty plea may affect local community programs she previously supported.

articles.title: Here’s what we know about Tyler Robinson, Charlie Kirk’s alleged assassin
articles.description:
Robinson is currently enrolled as a third-year student in the electrical apprenticeship program at Dixie Technical College in St. George, Utah.

summary: Tyler Robinson, a third-year student, is linked to Charlie Kirk's alleged assassination attempt.
Robinson is enrolled in an electrical apprenticeship program at Dixie Technical College in Utah.
Boston residents may be concerned about the implications of political violence affecting local safety.

articles.title: 7 things to know about a pivotal Red Sox-Yankees series
articles.description:
Whoever wins the series will have the inside track to getting the top wild-card spot in the American League and could still win the division.

The post 7 things to know about a pivotal Red Sox-Yankees series appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox face Yankees in crucial series for playoff positioning.

Series outcome could influence Boston's chances for division title.

articles.title: Winthrop loses $1.2M in climate grants over MBTA Communities Act noncompliance
articles.description:
Winthrop's noncompliance with the state housing law has cost the town critical flood mitigation funding.

The post Winthrop loses $1.2M in climate grants over MBTA Communities Act noncompliance appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Winthrop loses $1.2 million in climate grants due to noncompliance with the MBTA Communities Act.
The funding was intended for critical flood mitigation projects in the town.
Residents face increased flood risks without this essential financial support.

articles.title: Healey orders flags at state buildings flown at half-staff to honor Charlie Kirk
articles.description:
Flags will remain at half-staff throughout Massachusetts until sunset Sunday.

The post Healey orders flags at state buildings flown at half-staff to honor Charlie Kirk appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Governor Healey orders flags at half-staff in Massachusetts to honor Charlie Kirk.
Flags will remain at half-staff until sunset on Sunday, September 17.
This gesture reflects the state's recognition of Kirk's contributions to the community.

articles.title: Here’s what some of the bullet casing engravings in the Charlie Kirk shooting mean
articles.description:
Many of the messages adopt the flippant, sarcastic chatter often found on online message boards and in-game chats.

The post Here’s what some of the bullet casing engravings in the Charlie Kirk shooting mean appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Investigators analyze bullet casing engravings from the Charlie Kirk shooting incident.
Engravings reflect online sarcasm, raising concerns about youth culture and violence.
Local residents express alarm over rising gun violence and its implications for community safety.
